text: CBC Montreal refers to: *CBME-FM, CBC Radio One on 88.5 FM *CBM-FM, CBC Radio 2 on 93.5 FM *CBMT-DT, CBC Television on channel 6 SRC Montréal refers to: *CBF-FM, Ici Radio-Canada Première on 95.1 FM *CBFX-FM, Espace musique on 100.7 FM *CBFT-DT, Ici Radio-Canada Télé on channel 2 See also: *Maison Radio- Canada, the main CBC/Radio-Canada premises in Montreal
title: CBC Montreal
